sentences.en: Abortions would only be allowed in cases of rape or incest.
sentences.cn: 只有被强奸或乱伦受孕才允许堕胎。

sentences.en: Our findings dovetailed with a 1978 EEG study of adults who were victims of incest.
sentences.cn: 我们的发现与1978年的一项研究,若合符节.

sentences.en: The same is true of the conception of incest.
sentences.cn: 血亲婚配的观念,也是如此.

words.tran_cn: 乱伦的；血亲相奸的；犯乱伦罪的

trans.tran_cn: 乱伦，近亲通婚，乱伦罪，血族相婚
trans.tran_en: sex between people who are closely related in a family
